synopsis.text: She's just turned 16, and high school student Kanna Aoyagi is about to embark on an unexpected journey into the world of adult video games. Encouraged by her older sister, Yayoi, who works at an erotic game company, Kanna finds herself stepping into the role of a voice actress for these games. Initially hesitant due to her inexperience and innocence, Kanna begins to explore this new world, drawing upon her vivid imagination and the support of her coworkers. As she navigates the challenges of her new role, Kanna must also keep her unique job a secret from her high school friends. Will she be able to rise to the occasion and succeed in this unconventional profession? Join Kanna in 'Koe de Oshigoto!' as she discovers her potential and learns to embrace her new role.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
